project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that performs basic data analysis to calculate and display the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns in a provided CSV file based on user input.

task.name: Implement functionality to load CSV file and parse its content
Implement feature to calculate mean for the specified numerical columns
Implement feature to calculate median for the specified numerical columns
Implement feature to calculate mode for the specified numerical columns
Write tests for loading CSV, mean calculation, median calculation, and mode calculation
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
